title: Action Comics v2 23 (2013) (Tablet Edition)
description:
I adjusted the resolution and compression of the original scan for easier reading on tablets and to save space. All credit goes to the original scanner for their hard work. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.


Action Comics 23.3

By:   	Charles Soule, Rags Morlaes, Rick Bryant, Aaron Kuder	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Superhero
Publisher:   	DC Comics	
Pub. Date:  	September 18, 2013
Format:         CBZ

Evil genius, sadistic businessman, sociopathic inmate--Lex Luthor is all this and more.

Now released from prison, there is nothing to stop Luthor from getting his way . . . not even Superman!
